subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen made the winning 3-pointer with less than three seconds to play in overtime, and he finished with 33 points in the Boston Celtics’ 98-95 victory against the host Toronto Raptors yesterday.
snippet: Ray Allen made the winning 3-pointer with less than three seconds to play in overtime, and he finished with 33 points in the Boston Celtics’ 98-95 victory against the host Toronto Raptors yesterday.
